Acadia Healthcare (“Acadia”) is a leading provider of behavioral 
healthcare services across the United States, operating a network 
of 250 behavioral healthcare facilities with approximately 11,000 
beds in 39 states and Puerto Rico. With approximately 23,000 
employees serving more than 75,000 patients daily, Acadia is 
the largest stand-alone behavioral healthcare company in the 
U.S. Acadia provides behavioral healthcare services to its 
patients in a variety of settings, including inpatient 
psychiatric hospitals, specialty treatment facilities, 
residential treatment centers, and outpatient clinics. About Acadia
